```{r}
make_one_bar <- function(point) {
  xLeft <- point$xL
  xRight <- point$xR
  height <- point$count
  res <- data.frame(
              x = c(xLeft,  xLeft,  xRight, xRight, NA),
              y = c(    0, height,  height,      0, NA)
  )
  res
}
one_to_five <- function(hist_data) {
  bars <- NULL
  for (k in 1:nrow(hist_data)) {
    new_bar <- make_one_bar(hist_data[k, ])
    bars <- rbind(bars, new_bar)
  }
  bars
}
```
